name: Heros and Monsters: Idle Clicker Game
name_original: Heros and Monsters: Idle Clicker Game
description:
The kingdom is under attack from the evil Mordek, who has sent an army of monsters to destroy it. It’s time to fight from the castle and all the way into his lair in the deep, dark forest cave. There, we will be able to destroy him and save the kingdom!

This is a simple-to-play idle clicker and crafter game.

Craft powerful equipment to boost your stats and rise up the levels before destroying Mordek, or sit back and watch the gold roll in.

Prestige along the way to help earn more gems, which can be used to buy resources or increase the game speed. There are no options to pay for anything - no hidden costs or super premium currency.
